summary: The module defines a hierarchy of classes that generate and manage the HTML representation of form fields. It provides a core widget class that builds attributes, formats values, and processes submitted data, along with specialized widgets for text input, passwords, checkboxes, file uploads, date and time selectors, dropdowns, multi‑selects, and composite widgets that combine several sub‑widgets. It also includes utilities for handling associated media (CSS/JS) required by widgets.
business_intent: To give Django developers a reusable, extensible set of components for rendering form controls in web pages, handling user input, validation, and related static resources, thereby simplifying form creation and processing.
